channel.title: How do I jar my client w/ cache?
channel.description: Hey everyone, so I don't really want to release my client and have all of the source files and cache and sprites etc. open for the user to edit (Yes, I know I can delete the .java files).. is there a way I can put everything into a jar? If not, can I jar my class files, delete the java files, and have the sprites and cache etc. in the same folder?

item.title: How do I jar my client w/ cache?
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

I haven’t the time to spoonfeed right now but this is really quite simple. Download a JARmaker and jar it with that, you can make the entire client a
.jar, and it would load and run the client by openinging that jar.
I’m busy with my own webclient for the time being but if you add my MSN: Bl00dpkscape@yahoo.com
ill gladly get back with you on this at some point.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I jar my client w/ cache?
